verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
It's always like springtime with You, making all things new

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Your light is breaking through the dark

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: This love it is sweeter than wine, Bringing joy, bringing life

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Your hope is rising like the dawn

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
This is what you do, this is what you do You make me come alive
This is what you do, this is what you do You make me come alive
This is what you do, this is what you do You make me come alive
This is what you do, this is what you do You make me come alive

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Post Chorus:
You make me come alive, You make me come alive
You make me come alive, You make me come alive

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
It's like I'm living for the first time, Finally living for the first time
It's like I'm living for the first time, Finally living for the first time
